regen.absent_element: procedure for a member to rejoin after being removed by the lead driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow a removed member to rejoin the call through a request to the lead driver.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
